ComicInfo.Summary: The Rubicon Trigger Part Two: Taskmaster must absorb the kinesic signatures of three top spies so that Fury can unlock the project that Maria Hill was working on before her murder. The first of these is Phil Coulson, director of the Squadron Supreme, but Coulson summons Hyperion to stop Taskmaster.
ComicInfo.Tags: Phil Coulson,Black Widow,Taskmaster,Nick Fury Jr.,Hyperion,Washington D.C.
ComicInfo.Title: The Rubicon Trigger Part Two
